name: Leading Jewel Knight, Salome
effect: [AUTO](VC)[Limit-Break 4]:When this unit attacks, if you have four or more rear-guards with "Jewel Knight" in their card names, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. [ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 2] cards with "Jewel Knight" in their card names], search your deck for up to one card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.

name: Pure Heart Jewel Knight, Ashlei
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. If this unit is on (VC), search for up to two cards instead of one. [AUTO](VC/RC):When your other unit is placed on this unit's circle, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and that placed unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Broken Heart Jewel Knight, Ashlei "Яeverse"
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 2 & Lock a rear-guard], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, retire it, look at the top four cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you have two or more locked cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to two grade 2 or less cards with "Jewel Knight" in their card names, call them to (RC), shuffle the deck, and for each of your locked cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you have three or more locked cards, until end of that battle, your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand to (GC).

name: Prevail Jewel Knight, Yvain
effect: [ACT](VC):[Legion 20000]"Jewel Knight, Swordmy"(If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit may return four cards from your drop into your deck once, search your deck for the specified card, and Legion) [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if this unit is [Legion], and you have six or more units with "Jewel Knight" in their card names, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle.

name: Explode Jewel Knight, Laile

[AUTO](VC/RC):When your other unit is placed on this unit's circle, that placed unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Jewel Knight, Swordmy
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1] card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name], search your deck for up to one grade 1 or less card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.

name: Fruiting Jewel Knight, Eunice

name: Calling Jewel Knight, Christine
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have three or more other rear-guards with "Jewel Knight" in their card names, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & reveal a grade 3 card from hand], search your deck for up to one grade 3 card with "Jewel Knight" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. At the end of that turn, put that unit into hand, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.

effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!
